briefTitle: Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of E2007 in Levodopa Treated Parkinson's Disease Patients With Motor Fluctuations
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group Study of the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of E2007 in Levodopa Treated Parkinson's Disease Patients With Motor Fluctuations
summary: This is a multi-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group study of E2007 in levodopa treated Parkinson's disease patients with motor fluctuations.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Total Daily OFF Time (Hours) to Week 20 (Including Last Observation Carried Forward [LOCF] Data)
